Package ru.alvisid.pacs.repository

Interface TypicalRepository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the repository's objects.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbsenceReasonRepository, AbsenceRepository, ActionRepository, ControlPointRepository, DayOffRepository, DepartmentRepository, DeptScheduleRepository, EditRepository, EmployeeRepository, EmpScheduleRepository, PointActionRepository, PointPermitRepository, PositionRepository, VisitorRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataJpaAbsenceReasonRepositoryImpl, DataJpaAbsenceRepositoryImpl, DataJpaActionRepositoryImpl, DataJpaControlPointRepositoryImpl, DataJpaDayOffRepositoryImpl, DataJpaDepartmentRepositoryImpl, DataJpaDeptScheduleRepositoryImpl, DataJpaEditRepositoryImpl, DataJpaEmployeeRepositoryImpl, DataJpaEmpScheduleRepositoryImpl, DataJpaPointActionRepositoryImpl, DataJpaPointPermitRepositoryImpl, DataJpaPositionRepositoryImpl, DataJpaVisitorRepositoryImpl
    public interface TypicalRepository<T>
    The generalized functional of a typical repository.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Glushkov Evgeniy

    • Method Detail

      • save

        T save​(T obj)
        Saves or updates a given object.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to save or update.
        Returns:
        a saved or update object, null - if there aren't updated object in the data base.

      • delete

        boolean delete​(int id)
        Deletes the object by specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the specified id of a deleted object.
        Returns:
        true - the entity is deleted, false - the entity isn't found.

      • get

        T get​(int id)
        Returns the object with the cpecifiec id.
        Parameters:
        id - the specifiec id of the object to get.
        Returns:
        an object with the cpecifiec id, null - if there aren't the object with the cpecifiec id in the DB.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<T> getAll()
        Returns the list with all objects.
        Returns:
        the list with all objects.
